quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
name: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
name: George Sand

quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
name: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
name: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
name: Matt Cameron

quote: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
name: Philip Green

quote: My family is my life, and everything else comes second as far as what's important to me.
name: Michael Imperioli

quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.
name: John W. Gardner

quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.
name: Kareena Kapoor Khan

quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
name: William Barclay

quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
name: Omar Khayyam

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself.
name: John Dewey

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
name: Buddha

quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
name: Voltaire

quote: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.
name: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
name: Confucius

quote: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
name: Magdalena Neuner

quote: Life is like a roller coaster, live it, be happy, enjoy life.
name: Avril Lavigne

quote: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
name: Buddha

quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: I'm lucky in having found the perfect partner to spend my life with.
name: Sara Paretsky

quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: Where there is love there is life.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Positivity, confidence, and persistence are key in life, so never give up on yourself.
name: Khalid

quote: Life was always a matter of waiting for the right moment to act.
name: Paulo Coelho

quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: You go through life wondering what is it all about but at the end of the day it's all about family.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.
name: Alan Alda

quote: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
name: Unknown

quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
name: Paris Hilton

quote: A dog will teach you unconditional love. If you can have that in your life, things won't be too bad.
name: Robert Wagner

quote: Simply enjoy life and the great pleasures that come with it.
name: Karolina Kurkova

quote: Life ain't always beautiful, but it's a beautiful ride.
name: Gary Allan

quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.
name: A. J. McLean

quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
name: Chris Rock

quote: I decided to fly through the air and live in the sunlight and enjoy life as much as I could.
name: Evel Knievel

quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
name: Sholom Aleichem

quote: We are all born alone and die alone. The loneliness is definitely part of the journey of life.
name: Jenova Chen

quote: Good friends, good books and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Luck is great, but most of life is hard work.
name: Iain Duncan Smith

quote: Life began with waking up and loving my mother's face.
name: George Eliot

quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
name: Mark Twain

quote: A man who has never made a woman angry is a failure in life.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls.
name: Pablo Picasso

quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
name: Willie Nelson

quote: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Just when I think I have learned the way to live, life changes.
name: Hugh Prather

quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
name: Immanuel Kant

quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: Do what you need to do and enjoy life as it happens.
name: John Scalzi

quote: Live life for the moment because everything else is uncertain!
name: Louis Tomlinson

quote: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Children are the anchors that hold a mother to life.
name: Sophocles

quote: Concision in style, precision in thought, decision in life.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: My fashion philosophy is, if you're not covered in dog hair, your life is empty.
name: Elayne Boosler

quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
name: Scott Hamilton

quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is.
name: Dennis Rodman

quote: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: One of the luckiest things that can happen to you in life is, I think, to have a happy childhood.
name: Agatha Christie

quote: Memories are the best things in life, I think.
name: Romy Schneider

quote: I believe that God put us in this jolly world to be happy and enjoy life.
name: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
name: Langston Hughes

quote: Life is all about having a good time.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.
name: Solomon Ortiz

quote: I wish my school days could have dragged on a little longer, or that I could go back and do it later in life.
name: Cara Delevingne

quote: If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: If the only prayer you ever say in your entire life is thank you, it will be enough.
name: Meister Eckhart

quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: I am the Way, the Truth, and the Life. No one comes to the Father except through me.
name: Jesus Christ

quote: Land is the secure ground of home, the sea is like life, the outside, the unknown.
name: Stephen Gardiner

quote: Each life is made up of mistakes and learning, waiting and growing, practicing patience and being persistent.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Smoking kills. If you're killed, you've lost a very important part of your life.
name: Brooke Shields

quote: Thank you for life, and all the little ups and downs that make it worth living.
name: Travis Barker

quote: Nobody gets to live life backward. Look ahead, that is where your future lies.
name: Ann Landers

quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: I'm just a regular person who believes life is simple, and I like a simple life.
name: Manny Pacquiao

quote: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life.
name: Teri Garr

quote: The regret of my life is that I have not said 'I love you' often enough.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I like people that enjoy life, 'cause I do the same.
name: Lil Wayne

quote: Life is a game and true love is a trophy.
name: Rufus Wainwright

quote: Life is something to do when you can't get to sleep.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: The happiest moment of my life was probably when my daughter was born.
name: David Duchovny

quote: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life: music and cats.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
name: Phillips Brooks

quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
name: William Morris

quote: Life isn't black and white. It's a million gray areas, don't you find?
name: Ridley Scott

quote: The good life is a process, not a state of being. It is a direction not a destination.
name: Carl Rogers

quote: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it.
name: Ernest Holmes

quote: Relax! Life is beautiful!
name: David L. Wolper

quote: If you do what you love, you'll never work a day in your life.
name: Marc Anthony

quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life is tough, and things don't always work out well, but we should be brave and go on with our lives.
name: Suga

quote: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
name: Helen Keller

quote: I've had to learn to fight all my life - got to learn to keep smiling. If you smile things will work out.
name: Serena Williams

quote: Without music, life is a journey through a desert.
name: Pat Conroy

quote: Life is a journey. When we stop, things don't go right.
name: Pope Francis

quote: Don't ever doubt yourselves or waste a second of your life. It's too short, and you're too special.
name: Ariana Grande

quote: Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain, there would be no life.
name: John Updike

quote: Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon.
name: Woody Allen

quote: One thing I've learned about life is that if you really let go, it's just a joy ride.
name: Ricky Williams

quote: The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: Life moves so fast. You gotta document the good times, man.
name: Big Boi

quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Being stylish is about enjoying your life and expressing yourself and your inner light.
name: Tori Amos

quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
name: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: My personal ambition remains the same - to be creative, to be modern, to stay one step ahead, to enjoy life.
name: Natalie Massenet

quote: No water, no life. No blue, no green.
name: Sylvia Earle

quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: The reason I exercise is for the quality of life I enjoy.
name: Kenneth H. Cooper

quote: I wish that every human life might be pure transparent freedom.
name: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: I feel that the simplicity of life is just being yourself.
name: Bobby Brown

quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: You were made perfectly to be loved - and surely I have loved you, in the idea of you, my whole life long.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: It's really not about what you have. It's about how you're able to enjoy life in general.
name: Kevin Harvick

quote: Grief is in two parts. The first is loss. The second is the remaking of life.
name: Anne Roiphe

quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: You can really only enjoy life when you're extremely busy.
name: Josephine de La Baume

quote: I intend to live life, not just exist.
name: George Takei

quote: The best things in life are often waiting for you at the exit ramp of your comfort zone.
name: Karen Salmansohn

quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: Caring - about people, about things, about life - is an act of maturity.
name: Tracy McMillan

quote: Without deep reflection one knows from daily life that one exists for other people.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: You learn more about life from watching 'Big Brother' than from reading a book.
name: John de Mol, Jr.

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.
name: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Life is about how much you can take and keep fighting, how much you can suffer and keep moving forward.
name: Anderson Silva

quote: Life is too short not to celebrate nice moments!
name: Jurgen Klopp

quote: There's only two people in your life you should lie to... the police and your girlfriend.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Be free, and live life fully.
name: Caroline Shaw

quote: Life is a series of waves to be embraced and overcome.
name: Danny Meyer

quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: Romance is the glamour which turns the dust of everyday life into a golden haze.
name: Carolyn Gold Heilbrun

quote: Whatever you do in life, surround yourself with smart people who'll argue with you.
name: John Wooden

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
name: Charles Darwin

quote: Life is like a ten speed bicycle. Most of us have gears we never use.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Education must not simply teach work - it must teach Life.
name: W. E. B. Du Bois

quote: Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
name: Bob Marley

quote: A happy life is one which is in accordance with its own nature.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: My whole life is about winning. I don't lose often. I almost never lose.
name: Donald Trump

quote: The hardest thing in life to learn is which bridge to cross and which to burn.
name: David Russell

quote: When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day.
name: Ella Woodward

quote: I live a very joyful life, with a lot of laughter and good times.
name: Kimberly Elise

quote: It's better to be a lion for a day than a sheep all your life.
name: Elizabeth Kenny

quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: The story of life is quicker than the blink of an eye, the story of love is hello, goodbye.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Life is short, and we should respect every moment of it.
name: Orhan Pamuk

quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
name: Neale Donald Walsch

quote: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: I think it's important to find the little things in everyday life that make you happy.
name: Paula Cole

quote: It's amazing. Life changes very quickly, in a very positive way, if you let it.
name: Lindsey Vonn

quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
name: Jackie Robinson

quote: No one really has a bad life. Not even a bad day. Just bad moments.
name: Regina Brett

quote: You have to go through those mountains and valleys - because that's what life is: soul growth.
name: Wayne Newton

quote: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
name: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Live and work but do not forget to play, to have fun in life and really enjoy it.
name: Eileen Caddy

quote: Over and over I marvel at the blessings of my life: Each year has grown better than the last.
name: Lawrence Welk

quote: All I want is to live a peaceful life, to regain my life and be happy.
name: Mickey Rooney

quote: We live in a fantasy world, a world of illusion. The great task in life is to find reality.
name: Iris Murdoch

quote: If you spend your whole life waiting for the storm, you'll never enjoy the sunshine.
name: Morris West

quote: Surprise is the greatest gift which life can grant us.
name: Boris Pasternak

quote: Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
name: John Lennon

quote: Beware the barrenness of a busy life.
name: Socrates

quote: When you are grateful - when you can see what you have - you unlock blessings to flow in your life.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Youth is something I never wanna take for granted. I just want to smile and live life.
name: Tyler, The Creator

quote: A happy wife is a happy life.
name: Gavin Rossdale

quote: I just enjoy life now. I just enjoy every morning I get to wake up.
name: Nas

quote: One of the most important days of my life was when I learned to ride a bicycle.
name: Michael Palin

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Telling a teenager the facts of life is like giving a fish a bath.
name: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Sometimes, life is unfair, and you have to suck it up and move on and not use it as an excuse.
name: Robert Kraft

quote: Old age is just a record of one's whole life.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: I always say that the times in my life when I've been happiest are the times when I've seen, like, a sunset.
name: Chris Evans

quote: No life's worth more than any other, no sister worth less than any brother.
name: Michael Franti

quote: Man does not control his own fate. The women in his life do that for him.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: Water is life, and clean water means health.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Life isn't always really glamorous and fabulous. It's about encouraging people to go back to natural beauty.
name: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: Life is a difficult game. You can win it only by retaining your birthright to be a person.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
name: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Life is like the ocean, it goes up and down.
name: Vanessa Paradis

quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Music is the soundtrack of your life.
name: Dick Clark

quote: It is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all.
name: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: I travel light. I think the most important thing is to be in a good mood and enjoy life, wherever you are.
name: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: I don't wait for the calendar to figure out when I should live life.
name: Gene Simmons

quote: I think in this life it's important to be kind, be thankful, and always be creative.
name: Bishop Briggs

quote: Without football, my life is worth nothing.
name: Cristiano Ronaldo

quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The only real things in life is the unexpected things. Everything else is just an illusion.
name: Watkin Tudor Jones

quote: Your daily life is your temple and your religion. When you enter into it take with you your all.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: I am blessed with a funny gene that makes me enjoy life.
name: Karan Patel

quote: Life is an adventure, it's not a package tour.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Never regret yesterday. Life is in you today and you make your tomorrow.
name: L. Ron Hubbard

quote: I love the beach. I love the sea. All my life I live within - in front of the sea.
name: Rafael Nadal

quote: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough.
name: Garrison Keillor

quote: You will always have ups and downs in your life and your career, but just stay positive and go for it.
name: Angelique Kerber

quote: My guiding principles in life are to be honest, genuine, thoughtful and caring.
name: Prince William

quote: Looking back at my life's voyage, I can only say that it has been a golden trip.
name: Ginger Rogers

quote: Everyone is necessarily the hero of his own life story.
name: John Barth

quote: I want to have fun. It's a beautiful life. You learn, you win, you lose, but you get up.
name: Nas

quote: No matter if you win or lose, the most important thing in life is to enjoy what you have.
name: Dong Dong

quote: I'm actually pretty shy in real life. But I guess in front of the camera, I focus.
name: Ranbir Kapoor

quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
name: Socrates

quote: My favorite thing is to have a big dinner with friends and talk about life.
name: Carla Gugino

quote: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.
name: Stephen Covey

quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
name: William James

quote: Life changes so quickly. feeling grateful to be around such wonderful people to strengthen and grow with.
name: Riley Keough

quote: If you don't embrace who you are and accept who you are, you won't be able to live a happy life.
name: Ciara

quote: Life's tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism; the way you play it is free will.
name: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Reading is a basic tool in the living of a good life.
name: Joseph Addison

quote: A bachelor's life is a fine breakfast, a flat lunch, and a miserable dinner.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Weddings are important because they celebrate life and possibility.
name: Anne Hathaway

quote: A happy life is one spent in learning, earning, and yearning.
name: Lillian Gish

quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: My daughter is my passion and my life.
name: Tamara Mellon

quote: A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone.
name: Charlie Chaplin

quote: If you're not having a good time, find something else that gives you some joy in life.
name: Penny Marshall

quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Here's to alcohol: the cause of, and answer to, all of life's problems.
name: Matt Groening

quote: I have had a happy life and thank the Lord. Goodbye and may God bless all!
name: Christopher McCandless

quote: The beginning of compunction is the beginning of a new life.
name: George Eliot

quote: One thing I've learned is when you find a best friend in this life, you better hang on.
name: Jim Nabors

quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: It is through gratitude for the present moment that the spiritual dimension of life opens up.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Our diversity is our strength. What a dull and pointless life it would be if everyone was the same.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: It's fun to have a partner who understands your life and lets you be you.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: Use plants to bring life.
name: Douglas Wilson

quote: Even when I'm sick and depressed, I love life.
name: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but of playing a poor hand well.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: God is to be worshipped as the one beloved, dearer than everything in this and next life.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Maybe that's what life is... a wink of the eye and winking stars.
name: Jack Kerouac

quote: Life is short. You have to be able to laugh at our pain or we never move on.
name: Jeff Ross

quote: Life and death are illusions. We are in a constant state of transformation.
name: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: Brotherhood means laying down your life for somebody, really willing to sacrifice yourself for somebody else.
name: Tim Hetherington

quote: Life is measured in love and positive contributions and moments of grace.
name: Carly Fiorina

quote: The crest and crowning of all good, Life's final star, is brotherhood.
name: Edwin Markham

quote: My life needs editing.
name: Mort Sahl

quote: Life is like a wheel. Sooner or later, it always come around to where you started again.
name: Stephen King

quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.
name: Charlie Chaplin

quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: We live in a rainbow of chaos.
name: Paul Cezanne

quote: Life is neither good or evil, but only a place for good and evil.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The whole point is to live life and be - to use all the colors in the crayon box.
name: RuPaul

quote: I'm a quiet person, and I live a quiet, pleasant, ordinary, simple life.
name: Mary McGarry Morris

quote: If you want to run, run a mile. If you want to experience a different life, run a marathon.
name: Emil Zatopek

quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
name: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.
name: Eric Davis

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle: you don't fall off unless you stop pedaling.
name: Claude Pepper

quote: I have a confidence about my life that comes from standing tall on my own two feet.
name: Jane Fonda

quote: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.
name: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: Life is about perspective and how you look at something... ultimately, you have to zoom out.
name: Whitney Wolfe Herd

quote: I'm really looking forward to seeing what life brings to me.
name: Rihanna

quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
name: Thomas Merton

quote: I always do what makes me happy - it doesn't make sense to live life unhappily.
name: Bibi Bourelly

quote: Into each life some rain must fall.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: There are more important things in life than winning or losing a game.
name: Lionel Messi

quote: I feel like I have a new life and I'm going to take full advantage of it.
name: William Green

quote: What I love most about this crazy life is the adventure of it.
name: Juliette Binoche

quote: Nothing is perfect. Life is messy. Relationships are complex. Outcomes are uncertain. People are irrational.
name: Hugh Mackay

quote: It takes half your life before you discover life is a do-it-yourself project.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: If people concentrated on the really important things in life, there'd be a shortage of fishing poles.
name: Doug Larson

quote: I don't trip on that much. I just like to enjoy life and be happy.
name: Roy Ayers

quote: Even in a world with much sadness, at its essence, life is beautiful.
name: Dianne Reeves

quote: That it will never come again is what makes life sweet.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: A library is not a luxury but one of the necessities of life.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Life is too short for long-term grudges.
name: Elon Musk

quote: I believe life is an intelligent thing: that things aren't random.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: Life every man holds dear; but the dear man holds honor far more precious dear than life.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: A photograph can be an instant of life captured for eternity that will never cease looking back at you.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life.
name: Jeanne Calment

quote: My life is about ups and downs, great joys and great losses.
name: Isabel Allende

quote: I enjoy being happy every day, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.
name: Christina Milian

quote: You can't get anywhere in life without taking risks.
name: Esme Bianco

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Success and failure are both part of life. Both are not permanent.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Life's like a movie, write your own ending. Keep believing, keep pretending.
name: Jim Henson

quote: It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
name: Rita Rudner

quote: Flying dreams mean that you're doing the right thing with your life.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Nobody's life is ever all balanced. It's a conscious decision to choose your priorities every day.
name: Elisabeth Hasselbeck

quote: Variety's the very spice of life, That gives it all its flavor.
name: William Cowper

quote: Failure at some point in your life is inevitable, but giving up is unforgivable.
name: Joe Biden

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Life is much too serious to be taken seriously.
name: Vicki Lawrence

quote: A baby is God's opinion that life should go on.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: My normal life is like being on holiday.
name: Valentino Rossi

quote: I really try to enjoy life and have joy with what I do.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: Every volcano is a powerful illustration of God's character. He is a Vesuvius of goodness, life, and energy.
name: Reinhard Bonnke

quote: I would rather die a meaningful death than to live a meaningless life.
name: Corazon Aquino

quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Life is hard for everyone. That's why there's such a nice reward at the end of it.
name: Aidan Quinn

quote: You just got with the flow because life is just all about how you feel.
name: Post Malone

quote: I do smoke in real life. A lot. We're all smoking right now in fact.
name: Michael Imperioli

quote: One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.
name: William Feather

quote: Comfortable shoes and the freedom to leave are the two most important things in life.
name: Shel Silverstein

quote: I'm really not that funny in real life! But I am the best audience one could find. I love to laugh.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: I know what it is like to be brought up with unconditional love. In my life that came from my grandmother.
name: Andre Leon Talley

quote: Never give up. You only get one life. Go for it!
name: Richard E. Grant

quote: My life is my message.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If a child, a spouse, a life partner, or a parent depends on you and your income, you need life insurance.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Today is your own. Tomorrow perchance may never come.
name: Swami Sivananda

quote: Live a life full of humility, gratitude, intellectual curiosity, and never stop learning.
name: Gza

quote: Nearly all the best things that came to me in life have been unexpected, unplanned by me.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Every human is an artist. The dream of your life is to make beautiful art.
name: Don Miguel Ruiz

quote: A sister is like yourself in a different movie, a movie that stars you in a different life.
name: Deborah Tannen

quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
name: Buddha

quote: Life is a blur when one is essaying different roles; it is so fulfilling.
name: Amitabh Bachchan

quote: Life is too short to miss out on the beautiful things like a double cheeseburger.
name: Channing Tatum

quote: One of the secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others.
name: Lewis Carroll

quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you ever have. Make the Now the primary focus of your life.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: My life is like a speeding bullet that just hasn't hit the target yet.
name: Kid Cudi

quote: All theory, dear friend, is gray, but the golden tree of life springs ever green.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.
name: Joseph Campbell

quote: A student of life considers the world a classroom.
name: Harvey Mackay

quote: Contemplate the good things in your life and be grateful for them.
name: Rebecca Pidgeon

quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one's own in the midst of abundance.
name: Buddha

quote: With an eye made quiet by the power of harmony, and the deep power of joy, we see into the life of things.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life.
name: Jean Paul

quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
name: Cesare Pavese

quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: Live your life fom your heart. Share from your heart. And your story will touch and heal people's souls.
name: Melody Beattie

quote: Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: The two basic items necessary to sustain life are sunshine and coconut milk.
name: Dustin Hoffman

quote: The true object of all human life is play. Earth is a task garden; heaven is a playground.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: When it comes to life the critical thing is whether you take things for granted or take them with gratitude.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: Sometimes I feel my whole life has been one big rejection.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: I just want to have a nice, happy life.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: We live a happy life, and we don't take anything too seriously.
name: Zoe Foster Blake

quote: Find ecstasy in life; the mere sense of living is joy enough.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
name: Walter Hagen

quote: Life's like a play: it's not the length, but the excellence of the acting that matters.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: To affect the quality of the day, that is the highest of arts.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Everything in life is luck.
name: Donald Trump

quote: All I really need to know... I learned in kindergarten.
name: Robert Fulghum

quote: True life is lived when tiny changes occur.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: The less routine the more life.
name: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Most people have never learned that one of the main aims in life is to enjoy it.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: I always had a fantasy of being a chef, because I like kitchen life.
name: Geoffrey Rush

quote: Let us put our minds together and see what life we can make for our children.
name: Sitting Bull

quote: Life comes from physical survival; but the good life comes from what we care about.
name: Rollo May

quote: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.
name: Arthur Miller

quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
name: Josh Billings

quote: Life must be lived as play.
name: Plato

quote: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness.
name: George Sand

quote: Because nobody goes through life without a scar.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: The great art of life is sensation, to feel that we exist, even in pain.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Success is due to our stretching to the challenges of life. Failure comes when we shrink from them.
name: John C. Maxwell

quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.
name: Mark Twain

quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: Whatever life throws at me I'll take it and be grateful for it as well.
name: Tom Felton

quote: I think I've discovered the secret of life - you just hang around until you get used to it.
name: Charles M. Schulz

quote: The hardest years in life are those between ten and seventy.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: Life is like a trumpet - if you don't put anything into it, you don't get anything out of it.
name: William Christopher Handy

quote: You can preach a better sermon with your life than with your lips.
name: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Try to see things differently - It's the only way to get a clearer perspective on the world and on your life.
name: Neal Shusterman

quote: Keep your eyes open to your mercies. The man who forgets to be thankful has fallen asleep in life.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: There is a very fine line between loving life and being greedy for it.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Life is a lot like jazz... it's best when you improvise.
name: George Gershwin

quote: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
name: William Wallace

quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Life is a zoo in a jungle.
name: Peter De Vries

quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.
name: Robert Byrne

quote: Execute every act of thy life as though it were thy last.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it.
name: Irving Berlin

quote: To me, if life boils down to one thing, it's movement. To live is to keep moving.
name: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Life is a DNA software system.
name: Craig Venter

quote: The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.
name: Henry Miller

quote: Life itself is the proper binge.
name: Julia Child

quote: The chief danger in life is that you may take too many precautions.
name: Alfred Adler

quote: I'm so happy with what has happened in my life.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: It's never too late in life to have a genuine adventure.
name: Robert Kurson

quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Not life, but good life, is to be chiefly valued.
name: Socrates

quote: All the art of living lies in a fine mingling of letting go and holding on.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Once you say you're going to settle for second, that's what happens to you in life.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Life is a tide; float on it. Go down with it and go up with it, but be detached. Then it is not difficult.
name: Prem Rawat

quote: We must be willing to let go of the life we have planned, so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: Here is the test to find whether your mission on Earth is finished: if you're alive, it isn't.
name: Richard Bach

quote: Give me the luxuries of life and I will willingly do without the necessities.
name: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: The greatest pleasure of life is love.
name: Euripides

quote: Let life happen to you. Believe me: life is in the right, always.
name: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: What we play is life.
name: Louis Armstrong

quote: A chain is no stronger than its weakest link, and life is after all a chain.
name: William James

quote: To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: We are all here for a spell, get all the good laughs you can.
name: Will Rogers

quote: Life is a lively process of becoming.
name: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
name: James M. Barrie

quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Live, so you do not have to look back and say: 'God, how I have wasted my life.'
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Life is made up of sobs, sniffles, and smiles, with sniffles predominating.
name: O. Henry

quote: Life is made up of marble and mud.
name: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Any life is made up of a single moment, the moment in which a man finds out, once and for all, who he is.
name: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: Life leaps like a geyser for those who drill through the rock of inertia.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: Our entire life - consists ultimately in accepting ourselves as we are.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: I have begun to think of life as a series of ripples widening out from an original center.
name: Seamus Heaney

quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
name: Mark Twain

quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Life consists in what a man is thinking of all day.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life imitates art far more than art imitates Life.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: What do we live for, if not to make life less difficult for each other?
name: George Eliot

quote: Life is never fair, and perhaps it is a good thing for most of us that it is not.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Once you bring life into the world, you must protect it. We must protect it by changing the world.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: We live in the world when we love it.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I have a simple philosophy: Fill what's empty. Empty what's full. Scratch where it itches.
name: Alice Roosevelt Longworth

quote: While there's life, there's hope.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
name: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day to day living that wears you out.
name: Anton Chekhov

quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
name: Anais Nin

quote: The art of life is to know how to enjoy a little and to endure very much.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: A person will sometimes devote all his life to the development of one part of his body - the wishbone.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
name: Seneca

quote: I want to live my life, not record it.
name: Jackie Kennedy

quote: What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
name: Wayne Dyer

quote: Life becomes harder for us when we live for others, but it also becomes richer and happier.
name: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Don't let life discourage you; everyone who got where he is had to begin where he was.
name: Richard L. Evans

quote: We can't plan life. All we can do is be available for it.
name: Lauryn Hill

quote: Life is largely a matter of expectation.
name: Horace

quote: Life has meaning only if one barters it day by day for something other than itself.
name: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: A man sooner or later discovers that he is the master-gardener of his soul, the director of his life.
name: James Allen

quote: There is just one life for each of us: our own.
name: Euripides

quote: Life appears to me too short to be spent in nursing animosity, or registering wrongs.
name: Charlotte Bronte

quote: Life comes from the earth and life returns to the earth.
name: Zhuangzi

quote: Life is too short to work so hard.
name: Vivien Leigh

quote: The difficulty in life is the choice.
name: George A. Moore

quote: Life is a succession of moments, to live each one is to succeed.
name: Corita Kent

quote: To live is to change, and to be perfect is to have changed often.
name: John Henry Newman

quote: The person lives twice who lives the first life well.
name: Robert Herrick

quote: The man who has no inner-life is a slave to his surroundings.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Don't go through life, grow through life.
name: Eric Butterworth

quote: Life is half spent before we know what it is.
name: George Herbert

quote: Life is anything that dies when you stomp on it.
name: Dave Barry

quote: Life is not an exact science, it is an art.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Wrong life cannot be lived rightly.
name: Theodor W. Adorno

quote: To be free is to have achieved your life.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: With renunciation life begins.
name: Amelia Barr

quote: To live is like to love - all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: With the past, I have nothing to do; nor with the future. I live now.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: People say that life is the thing, but I prefer reading.
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: I bear a charmed life.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Life loves the liver of it.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Seventy percent of success in life is showing up.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Art is the proper task of life.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: He not busy being born is busy dying.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
name: Carl Jung

quote: All of life is peaks and valleys. Don't let the peaks get too high and the valleys too low.
name: John Wooden

quote: The best path through life is the highway.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: The personal life deeply lived always expands into truths beyond itself.
name: Anais Nin

quote: Life is the art of drawing sufficient conclusions from insufficient premises.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: Life is very short and what we have to do must be done in the now.
name: Audre Lorde

quote: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Life does not cease to be funny when people die any more than it ceases to be serious when people laugh.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: When I hear somebody sigh, 'Life is hard,' I am always tempted to ask, 'Compared to what?'
name: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Life well spent is long.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: No man is a failure who is enjoying life.
name: William Feather

quote: While we are postponing, life speeds by.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: We are here to add what we can to life, not to get what we can from life.
name: William Osler

quote: Only an artist can interpret the meaning of life.
name: Novalis

quote: If we live good lives, the times are also good. As we are, such are the times.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: The greatest trap in our life is not success, popularity or power, but self-rejection.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: What a wonderful life I've had! I only wish I'd realized it sooner.
name: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Everything has been figured out, except how to live.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Our business in life is not to succeed, but to continue to fail in good spirits.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The most exhausting thing in life is being insincere.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: The greatest use of a life is to spend it on something that will outlast it.
name: William James

quote: The most satisfying thing in life is to have been able to give a large part of one's self to others.
name: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Life's a fight. It's a good fight of faith.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Life is a moderately good play with a badly written third act.
name: Truman Capote

quote: What is important in life is life, and not the result of life.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: To be able to look back upon one's past life with satisfaction is to live twice.
name: John Dalberg-Acton

quote: Take care of your life and the Lord will take care of your death.
name: George Whitefield

quote: This life is worth living, we can say, since it is what we make it.
name: William James

quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: To live is to think.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Unbeing dead isn't being alive.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: Nothing is more precious than life... especially the life of your child.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: Not a shred of evidence exists in favor of the idea that life is serious.
name: Brendan Gill

quote: Remember when life's path is steep to keep your mind even.
name: Horace

quote: Life is wasted on the living.
name: Douglas Adams

quote: The real business of life is trying to understand each other.
name: Gilbert Parker

quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
name: Grandma Moses

quote: To know nothing is the happiest life.
name: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: An aim in life is the only fortune worth finding.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Life ought to be a struggle of desire toward adventures whose nobility will fertilize the soul.
name: Rebecca West

quote: Growth is the only evidence of life.
name: John Henry Newman

quote: A little credulity helps one on through life very smoothly.
name: Elizabeth Gaskell

quote: Life will always be to a large extent what we ourselves make it.
name: Samuel Smiles

quote: Life is a gift, given in trust - like a child.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: I don't expect to live forever, but I do intend to hang on as long as possible.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: You don't have to be the Dalai Lama to tell people that life's about change.
name: John Cleese

quote: Each day is the scholar of yesterday.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: We pass through this world but once.
name: Stephen Jay Gould

quote: The Wine of Life keeps oozing drop by drop, The Leaves of Life keep falling one by one.
name: Edward Fitzgerald

quote: How sweet it is!
name: Jackie Gleason

quote: The dearest days in one's life are those that seem very far and very near at once.
name: Abraham Cahan

quote: Life is never easy for those who dream.
name: Robert James Waller

quote: A healthful hunger for a great idea is the beauty and blessedness of life.
name: Jean Ingelow

quote: Life's more amusing than we thought.
name: Andrew Lang

quote: We are to seek wisdom and understanding only in the length of days.
name: Robert Hall

quote: There is no wealth but life.
name: John Ruskin

quote: My trade and art is to live.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: I love life because what more is there?
name: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: I take a simple view of life. It is keep your eyes open and get on with it.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: For the happiest life, days should be rigorously planned, nights left open to chance.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: I am an artist... I am here to live out loud.
name: Emile Zola

quote: I am I plus my circumstances.
name: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: We cannot put off living until we are ready.
name: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Unrest of spirit is a mark of life.
name: Karl A. Menninger

quote: Conduct is three-fourths of our life and its largest concern.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: Life is a work in progress.
name: Jeff Rich

quote: The fear of life is the favorite disease of the 20th century.
name: William Lyon Phelps

quote: Life itself still remains a very effective therapist.
name: Karen Horney

quote: I take care of my flowers and my cats. And enjoy food. And that's living.
name: Ursula Andress

quote: Nobody got where they are today by living for tomorrow.
name: Tom Wilson

quote: I look back on my life like a good day's work, it was done and I am satisfied with it.
name: Grandma Moses

quote: If life had a second edition, how I would correct the proofs.
name: John Clare

quote: I do not regret one moment of my life.
name: Lillie Langtry

quote: The main facts in human life are five: birth, food, sleep, love and death.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: I am simply trying to struggle through life; trying to do God's bidding.
name: George Lucas

quote: The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
name: Ben Stein

quote: He is a man, who is to be a man, the fruit is always present in the seed.
name: Tertullian

quote: Every man regards his own life as the New Year's Eve of time.
name: Jean Paul

quote: Life has a higher end, than to be amused.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: Life is a horizontal fall.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: Pain and death are part of life. To reject them is to reject life itself.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really want is only what you really need.
name: Vernon Howard

quote: I am all for the short and merry life.
name: Edward Fitzgerald

quote: Who cares about great marks left behind? We have one life... just one. Our life. We have nothing else.
name: Ugo Betti

quote: The whole secret of life is to be interested in one thing profoundly and in a thousand things well.
name: Horace Walpole

quote: Life is much shorter than I imagined it to be.
name: Abraham Cahan

quote: I have inspiration and feelings of being alive most every day I live.
name: Judy Collins

quote: I had no blood relatives till I made some.
name: Andy Dick

quote: My life is every moment of my life. It is not a culmination of the past.
name: Hugh Leonard
